product_description: Get grounded with the natural details that make this the perfect sunny-day platform, from the woven espadrille-inspired base to the raffia buckle at the ankle.
product_details_and_care:
Get grounded with the natural details that make this the perfect sunny-day platform, from the woven espadrille-inspired base to the raffia buckle at the ankle.
